===Etymology 1===
Ultimately from a form ''kopori'', which was reduced first to ''koɸori'', then ''kowori'', then ''koori'', and finally ''koːri''.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/kʰoːɺ̠i/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こおり|hhira=こほり}}

# [[ice]]
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|1|46}}
#*: 氷 [...] 和名比、一云'''古保利'''

===Etymology 2===
From a form ''pi'' which was reduced to ''ɸi'' and then to ''hi''.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/çi/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひ}}

# [[ice]]
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|1|46}}
